description: This file defines several asynchronous functions for interacting with a tasks API, including listing, creating, retrieving, and updating tasks, as well as managing comments related to tasks.

methods.name: listTasks({ token, filters, limit, offset })
methods.description: Fetches a list of tasks with optional filters, pagination, using GET /tasks.

methods.name: createTask({ token, payload })
methods.description: Creates a new task by sending a POST request to /tasks with the provided payload.

methods.name: getTask({ token, taskId })
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific task via GET /tasks/{task_id}.

methods.name: updateTask({ token, taskId, payload })
methods.description: Updates an existing task with new data via PATCH /tasks/{task_id}.

methods.name: listComments({ token, taskId })
methods.description: Retrieves comments for a specific task via GET /tasks/{task_id}/comments.

methods.name: addComment({ token, taskId, body })
methods.description: Adds a comment to a specific task via POST /tasks/{task_id}/comments.

ctags.name: addComment
ctags.pattern: /^export async function addComment({ token, taskId, body }) {$/

ctags.name: listTasks
ctags.pattern: /^export async function listTasks({ token, filters, limit, offset }) {$/

ctags.name: updateTask
ctags.pattern: /^export async function updateTask({ token, taskId, payload }) {$/
